Factsheet

Developer:
Imagination Overflow
Based in Sudoku Puzzles
Release date:
28 Feb, 2018
Platforms:
iOS
Android
Windows(UWP)
PC
Mac
Steam
Website:
sudokuzenkai.imaginationoverflow.com

Description

Sudoku Zenkai is a game for all types sudoku players: beginners and advanced.
Sudoku Zenkai adds a new dimension to Sudoku: it lets you play together with a friend! Now you can create puzzles and play with your friend. But there is more, if you are suck in a puzzle, you can ask help to a friend by sharing our board with them.
Download Zenkai Sudoku and find more features that will help you become a Sudoku master player.

History

Sudoku Zenkai is a game for beginners and advanced players of sudoku.
But you can also play cooperatively with your friends, just create a puzzle and invite a friend to play with you. So you can find out who is your best friend Zenkai to create the best sudoku team. But there is more, if you have blocked a puzzle and you no longer have hints, then you can ask help to a friend by sharing our board with them. So two heads think better than one to solve the puzzle.
Train your brain and test your logic and perception skills with sudoku puzzles. Best exercise for your mind you can imagine. Sudoku Zenkai have 6 difficulty levels, so you can start for trainner levels to exercise your logical thinking and memory, or try insane levels to give your mind a real workout.
Take the Sudoku Zenkai wherever you want and you can play on any device: mobile or PC.
Sudoku Zenkai game has some features that help you to resolve sudoku puzzles: hints, auto-check, and duplicates highlight. You can use them or complete the challenge without help – it's up to you!
What's more, the game contains several themes that you can use to help you solve the puzzles faster. Tired of playing with numbers? do not worry, with Sudoku Zenkai contains a list of emblems that you can use to replace the numbers.
This game has its own high-quality puzzle generator on board. There are always fresh and unique puzzles available.No Internet connection is required, it is all done in the device! Need a break? Puzzles are saved when you close the app, so you can continue later.
With Sudoku Zenkai, you won’t be looking for a paper puzzle ever again!
Download Zenkai Sudoku and find more features that will help you become a Sudoku master player.

Features

  • Six difficulty levels, from Trainee to Zenkai, ensure that you will be able to find a puzzle that matches your skill level.
  • Sudoku Zenkai has its own high-quality puzzle generator on board. It quietly generates new sudokus as you play. No matter how much you play or weather you have an internet connection: There are always fresh and unique puzzles available.
  • Don't like to play alone? Don't worry, with Soduku Zenkai you can invite a friend to help you out solving the puzzle!
  • Sudoku Zenkai comes with several themes to help you focus on the game. New themes come out every week.
  • Tired of playing with numbers? do not worry, with sudoku zenkai contains a list of emblems that you can use to replace the numbers.
  • Turn on Pencil mode to make notes as on paper. Each time you fill in a cell, notes are automatically updated!
  • Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
  • Our game is frustration-free! If you don’t know how to proceed, use a hint and get past that hurdle.
  • Did you miss a turn and do not know which one? Then returns to state no errors with last valid board feature and continues to play.
  • Unlimited Undos. Made a mistake? Just put it back quickly
  • If you leave a sudoku unfinished it will be saved. Continue playing anytime
  • Highlighting of a row, column and box related to the selected cell
  • Eraser. Get rid of all mistakes
  • Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block
  • You can play Sudoku Zenkai on all platforms: Smartphone, Tablet and PC.
  • Enjoy beautiful and relaxing music in our game!
